price: Mola wetu Mlezi! Tutoe humu Motoni. Na tufanyapo tena basi kweli sisi ni wenye kudhulumu.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡهَا فَإِنۡ عُدۡنَا فَإِنَّا ظَٰلِمُونَ
footnotes: Na watasema: Mola wetu Mlezi! Tutoe Motoni na uturejeshe duniani. Basi tukirudi tena kwenye ukafiri na uasi basi tutakuwa kweli ni twenye kujidhulumu nafsi zetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: rabbanā akhrij'nā min'hā fa-in ʿud'nā fa-innā ẓālimūna
